data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Parequula (Pisces: Gerreidae) with a new species from southwestern Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Iwatsuki, Yukio, Pogonoski, John J., Last, Peter (2012): Revision of the genus Parequula (Pisces: Gerreidae) with a new species from southwestern Australia. Zootaxa 3425: 42-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282006
